#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
int main()
{
ll t,n,k,n1,val1,i,rem,val2,a[1000],j,temp;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
    cin>>n>>k;
    val1=n*k;
    i=0;
    n1=n;
    rem=0;
    while(n1)
    {
        if(n1%10==k)
        {
        a[i++]=((n1%10)+k+rem)%10;
        rem=((n1%10)+k+rem)/10;
        }
        else if(n1%10!=k)
        {
            a[i++]=((n1%10)*k+rem)%10;
            rem=((n1%10)*k+rem)/10;
        }
        n1=n1/10;
    }
    a[i++]=rem;
    val2=0;
    for(j=i-1;j>=0;j--)
    {
        val2=val2*10+a[j];
    }
    cout<<val1+val2<<endl;

}
return 0;
}
